sentences.english: This paper proposes a recursive forecast method for elevator traffic flow based on outlier detection.

sentences.english: It was an old-fashioned lift, operated by a lever on a brass box.

sentences.english: The door of the elevator was closed and continued ascending.

sentences.english: Could I have a room far away from the elevators?

definition: aerial work platform (e.g. cherry picker or scissor lift)/lift/elevator
(used in the names of grand buildings such as 百老匯大廈|百老汇大厦 Broadway Mansions (in Shanghai) or 帝國大廈|帝国大厦 Empire State Building etc)
car or other vehicle (bicycle, truck etc)
building (a relatively large, multi-storey one)/CL:幢[zhuang4],座[zuo4]
to get on or into (a bus, train, car etc)
to pull up (stop one's vehicle)/to park/(of a machine) to stop working/to stall
shopping mall/shopping center/department store/emporium/CL:家[jia1]/the business world
